definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Her hair is yellow. Do you have any dogs?
sentences.chinese: 她的毛是黃色的。恁兜敢有狗仔？

sentences.english: She recited the speech, and Munindra recorded it .
sentences.chinese: 然後她念出就職演說，穆恁德拉把它錄下來。

sentences.english: Now I always have a tube by my bedside.
sentences.chinese: 恁嘎我牀頭單單有一支個個。

sentences.english: The following are based on Munindra's recollections.
sentences.chinese: 下面內容是基於穆恁德拉的回憶。

definition: (modal final particle similar to 呢[ne5] or 啦[la5])
mile (unit of length equal to 1,609.344 m)/old form of modern 英里[Ying1 li3]
(dialect) no good/(contraction of 不 and 好)/see 孬種|孬种[nao1 zhong3]
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
baby/small child/(arch.) slave among ethnic minorities
see 王八羔子[wang2 ba1 gao1 zi5]
sentence-final particle similar to 了[le5], but carrying a tone of approval
to draw back the corners of one's mouth
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
